data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Toluca.
Diego Abella of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 4, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 12, Toluca drives forward and Rubens Sambueza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
America needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 13, Free kick for America in the half of Toluca.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, America takes a corner from the right.
America are coming forward and Federico Vinas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Free kick America.
Goal! Federico Vinas gives America a 1-0 lead.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Toluca!
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
In the minute 26, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Toluca to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 29, Brandon Sartiaguin is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
America have a goal kick.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Toluca's Diego Abella misses with an attempt on goal.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick Toluca.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 37, Brandon Sartiaguin (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Henry Martin for America who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
America pushes forward through Richard Sanchez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of America.
Henry Martin is back on the pitch.
Free kick for America in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Corner awarded to America.
America are pushing forward but Emanuel Aguilera's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in America.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick America.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, The home team replace Federico Vinas with Roger Martinez.
Toluca to take a throw-in in America territory.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 49, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, America's Leonardo Suarez is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Roger Martinez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 55, Roger Martinez (America) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Giovani Dos Santos.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of America.
Sebastian Caceres (America) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, America make their third substitution with Sebastian Cordova replacing Ruben Gonzalez.
Giovani Dos Santos (America) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
America are pushing forward but Richard Sanchez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of America.
Jorge Sanchez (America) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, Free kick for America in their own half.
Diego Abella is booked for the away team.
William da Silva is replacing Diego Abella for the away team.
In the minute 64, Diego Gonzalez is on a sub for Carlos Cisneros for Toluca.
America's Sebastian Cordova misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of America.
Brandon Sartiaguin's header is off-target for Toluca.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by America defenders.
Nicolas Benedetti of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for America in the half of Toluca.
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
America takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to America.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
America to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
America drives forward and Leonardo Suarez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 83, Leonardo Suarez of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 85, Rubens Sambueza is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Rubens Sambueza is back on his feet again.
Jorge Sanchez (America) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Free kick Toluca.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
America are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
